tags.name: contribution
tags.description: Submit, moderate and retrieve user contributions

tags.name: notifications
tags.description: Notifications are templated email messages which can be sent to contributors. A notification might be used to request further information from a contributor or inform them when their contribution has been published.

tags.name: subscriptions
tags.description: Subscribe to be alerted when events occur. For example receive email notification when a contribution is flagged.

tags.name: tag
tags.description: Create and list tags and tag sets

parameters.name: ownedBy
parameters.description: Restrict results to assignments owned by this user.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Pagination page

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: Pagination page size

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Restrict results to assignments whose name or description matches this keyword.

parameters.name: urlWords
parameters.description: Select an assignment by urlWords.

parameters.name: open
parameters.description: Select open or closed assignments

parameters.name: alwaysOpen
parameters.description: Select assignments with no closing date.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Restrict results to assignments which are tagged with this tag.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Restrict results to the assignment (or potentially assignments) with this exact name

400.description: The new assignment vailed to validate. Check the response body for details.

500.description: Failed to create the new assignment due to an unexpected error.

get.summary: Get a single assigment by id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the assignment to return

delete.summary: Delete this assignment and all of it's contributions

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the assignment to return

403.description: Not permitted to delete this assignment.

200.description: A list of change log items
An array of refinement types. These are the possible values of the get contribution refinements parameter.

get.description: Given a contribution list query determine the available filter options. Can be used to generate the UI to refinement a filter.

parameters.name: assignment
parameters.description: Restrict results to contributions submitted to this assignment.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Limit results to contributions which have a publicly visible location within the given country (specified by two letter country code).

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Limit results to contributions created before this date time.

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description: Limit results to contributions created after this date time.

parameters.name: geohash
parameters.description: Restrict results to contributions which have specified a location which falls within this geohash (or comma seperated list of multiple geohashes)

parameters.name: hasLocation
parameters.description: Restrict results to contributions which have a publicly visible location.

parameters.name: latLong
parameters.description: Limit results to contributions with location near this latitude and longitude (comma seperated lat/long pair). Also see radius

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: When limiting result by location with the latLong parameter, specify the radius in kilometers.

parameters.name: mediaType
parameters.description: Restrict results to contributions which include a media file of the given type (ie. image / video)

parameters.name: ownedBy
parameters.description: Restrict results to contributions which are fall under the jurisdiction by this user.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Restrict results to contributions whose headline text matches this keyword.

parameters.name: urlWords
parameters.description: Locate a specific contribution by URL words

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: Restrict results to contributions by this user identified by id.

parameters.name: refinements
parameters.description: Comma seperated list of refinement names.

parameters.name: refinementSize
parameters.description: Number of refinement options to return.

200.description: A map of refinement names to lists of options

parameters.description: Restrict results to a list of specific contributions identified by a comma seperated list of ids.

parameters.description: Select output format. 'json' or 'rss'. Defaults to JSON.

get.summary: Get a single contribution by id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the contribution to return

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the contribution to delete

200.description: The deletion request has been accepted and will be processed in the background.

403.description: The currently authorised user is not allowed to delete this contribution.

post.summary: Raise a flag against this contribution
post.description: Allows end users to bring potential issues with publicly visible content to the attention of moderators.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the contribution to flag

post.summary: Allows a user to mark a contribution as liked

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the contribution

200.description: The updated like count for this contribution.

get.summary: List users who have liked this contributions
get.description: Returns a list of user ids of users who have liked this conribution

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the contribution

post.summary: Perform a moderation action on this contribution
post.description: Allows the contribution to approved of rejected.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the contribution to moderate

200.description: The moderation action was successfully applied

400.description: The submission falied to validate. Check the response body for details.

401.description: The request was not correctly authorised.

403.description: You do not have permission to perform this moderation action.

get.summary: List the credentials associated with the authenticated user.

200.description: A list of credentials associated with this user.

parameters.name: tagSet
parameters.description: Restrict results to tags belonging to this tag set.

get.summary: Retrieve a single tag set by id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the tag set to return

parameters.name: assignment
parameters.description: Restrict results to the users who have contributed to this assignment.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Restrict results to the users who have submitted a contribution with a public location located within this country.

parameters.name: minimumContributions
parameters.description: Restrict results to the users who have submitted at least this many contributions.

parameters.name: linkedProfile
parameters.description: Restrict results to the users who a linked profile of this type.

parameters.name: ownedBy
parameters.description: Restrict results to the users who are owned by of this owner.

parameters.name: submittedBefore
parameters.description: Limit results to users who have submitted at least one contribution before this date time.

parameters.name: submittedAfter
parameters.description: Limit results to users who have submitted at least one contribution after this date time.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Restrict results to the user with this username.

get.summary: Retrieve a single user by id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the user to return

get.summary: Retrieve a users linked profile by type

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the user to return

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of the linked profile to fetch

post.summary: Verify token and return details of the owning user

callToAction.description: An optional call to action specific to this assignment. ie. Submit your snow pictures.

moderator.description: Optional credential id of the moderator who owns this particular assignment.

open.description: Helper value. Is this assignment currently open? Based on the value of the ends field.

receiptMessage.description: An optional assignment specific message to be displayed on successful contribution submission. For example, this might be used to inform contributors of assignment specific moderation time frames.

moderator.description: Optional credential id of the login which will moderator this assignment.

receiptMessage.description: An optional assignment specific message to be displayed on successful contribution submission. For example, this might be used to inform contributors of assignment specific moderation time frames.

attribution.description: The public attribution for this contribution. This will be the display name of the registered user or the contributor's first and last name if they provided them while making a non authenticated contribution. A blank attribution field indicates and anonymous contribution.

contributions.description: The number of contributions selected for export.

estimatedSize.description: Human readable estimate of the export size. ie. '10MB'.

media.description: The number of media files included in this export.

totalMediaSize.description: The expected total size of the media files to be exported.
